languages.text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все союзники получают бонус +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × FEL bonus)</u> bonus to Weapon and Ballistic Skill tests.

All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

languages.text: 所有盟友在{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}检定中获得+<u>（4×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>加成。
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有盟友在武器{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}和弹道技能检定中获得+<u>（4×社交{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>加成。

languages.text: Todos los aliados reciben una bonificación de +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados reciben una bonificación de +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por EMP )</u> a las pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de armas y Habilidad de proyectiles.

languages.text: すべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}に<u>（4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>を得る。
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: すべての味方は武器{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}と弾道スキル判定に<u>(4 × FEL{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>を得る。

languages.text: Все союзники получают бонус +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все союзники получают бонус +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ)</u> при совершении проверок {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Ближнего Боя{/g} и Дальнего Боя.
Все союзники получают бонус +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ)</u> при совершении проверок {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Ближнего Боя{/g} и Дальнего Боя.

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-Bonus)</u> auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Verbündeten erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +<u>(4 × GEF-Bonus)</u> auf Proben für {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und Ballistik-Fertigkeit.

languages.text: Tous les alliés reçoivent un bonus de +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g})</u>, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés reçoivent un bonus de +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g})</u> pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.

languages.text: Tüm dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar bonus kazanırlar.
languages.original_text: All allies gain a +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
